alert.note: Alert for Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 8:42PM EDT until July 29 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL SUFFOLK COUNTY... At 842 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Old Saybrook to near Shelter Island to Shinnecock Hills to near Westhampton to near Mastic Beach, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Riverhead, Southold, Center Moriches, Southampton, Westhampton, Mastic Beach, Shinnecock Hills, Peconic, Hampton Bays, East Moriches, East Quogue, Flanders, North Sea, Cutchogue, and Remsenburg-Speonk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
